title: Trend Micro Control Manager cmdHandlerFileHandling Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Trend Micro Control Manager. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within cmdHandlerFileHandling.dll. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code under the context of the iusr account.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/1117722
timeline:
2017-04-05 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2017-07-31 - Coordinated public release of advisory
